plot: The boys try to save Chef from a woman who is stealing him from them. Meanwhile, Cartman gets glasses.

The kids are shocked when they come to school one morning to find their beloved chef gone from his usual post at the cafeteria. After doing some investigating, they discover that Chef has fallen in love with a woman named Veronica and has turned his back on everything he once prized. Mr. Garrison tells the boys that Veronica may be a succubus: a demon that sucks out the life force of men while controlling their minds with a song. Chef refuses to heed the children's warnings, so they must find another way to break the demon's spell.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>
